title: Experience-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Sustainable Societal Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening practitioner capabilities for implementing corporate ESG management strategies, requiring case-based learning focused on field applications

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more sustainable consumption strategies applicable in corporate settings
Learners can analyze organizational sustainability issues and design improvement plans using systems thinking methodologies
Learners can develop and implement educational modules that induce sustainable behavioral changes, incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
